name: iField
description: An on/offline fieldlinguistics database app which adapts to its user's I-Language.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://docs.google.com/ https://ifield.fieldlinguist.com/ https://localhost:3001/ https://si0.twimg.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com/ https://www.youtube.com/; script-src 'self' https://ssl.google-analytics.com/ https://localhost:3001/; connect-src  https://www.youtube.com/ https://ifield.fieldlinguist.com/ https://localhost:3001/ https://ilanguage.iriscouch.com/ https://ilanguage.iriscouch.com:443/ 'self'; object-src 'self';
